home.headline: Web Developer and Problem Solver
home.subline:
I'm {person.firstName}, a Laravel web developer passionate about building efficient and scalable web applications.
Beyond developing applications, I actively explore emerging technologies and transform innovative ideas into impactful solutions.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Passionate and driven web developer with a solid foundation in computer science and programming principles. A recent graduate now honing my skills in Laravel development, I bring hands-on experience in creating dynamic, user-friendly web applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I am committed to continuous learning and staying at the forefront of emerging technologies, aiming to deliver impactful digital solutions and grow in the ever-evolving tech industry.

AI Pinnacle Private Limited, Rawalpindi.achievements:
Responsible for both front-end and backend development, coding, and maintaining web applications.
                       Collaborated with the development team to ensure timely project delivery.
                        Assisted in troubleshooting and debugging issues to improve application performance.

Developed and maintained web applications with a focus on both front-end and back-end development using Laravel.
 Worked closely with the development team to ensure project deliverables met client specifications and deadlines.

Laravel.description: Proficient in Laravel for building robust and scalable web applications, with expertise in backend development and database management.

HTML/CSS.description: Proficient in HTML5 and CSS3 for structuring and styling responsive web pages with a focus on accessibility and performance.
